name: Belle's House
subtitle: Maurice's Workshop
author: Alex Shin

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If I have 2 characters at Belle’s House – Maurice’s Workshop, do I pay 2 {I} less for items?
A: No. No matter how many characters you have at Belle’s House – Maurice’s Workshop, you’ll only pay 1 {I} less to play items. If you have 2 copies of Belle’s House – Maurice’s Workshop in play and a character at each of them, however, you’ll pay 2 {I} less to play items.

flavor_text: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.
rules_text: LABORATORY If you have a character here, you pay 1 less to play items.
